TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolStripRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 处理 对象的绘制功能。

span.span: Handles the painting functionality for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类将特定样式或主题应用到 。Use the class to apply a particular style or theme to a . 将 属性设置为从 继承的对象，而不是使用自定义绘制 及其包含的 对象。Rather than custom painting a and the objects it contains, you set the property to an object that inherits from . 指定的绘制将应用于 以及它所包含的项。The painting specified by the is applied to the , as well as the items it contains. 可以通过多种方式在 控件中执行自定义绘制。You can do custom painting in controls in several ways. 与其他 Windows 窗体控件一样， 和 都具有可重写的 `OnPaint` 方法和 `Paint` 事件。As with other Windows Forms controls, the and both have overridable `OnPaint` methods and `Paint` events. 与常规绘制一样，坐标系统是相对于控件的工作区的;也就是说，控件的左上角是0，0。As with regular painting, the coordinate system is relative to the client area of the control; that is, the upper left-hand corner of the control is 0, 0. 的 `Paint` 事件和 `OnPaint` 方法的行为类似于其他控件绘制事件。The `Paint` event and `OnPaint` method for a behave like other control paint events. 类具有可重写的方法，用于绘制 的背景、项背景、项图像、项箭头、项文本和边框。The class has overridable methods for painting the background, item background, item image, item arrow, item text, and border of the . 这些方法的事件自变量会公开几个属性，如矩形、颜色和文本格式，你可以根据需要进行调整。The event arguments for these methods expose several properties such as rectangles, colors, and text formats that you can adjust as desired. 若要仅调整项绘制方式的几个方面，通常需要重写 。To adjust just a few aspects of how an item is painted, you typically override the . 如果你正在编写一个新项并想要控制绘制的所有方面，请重写 `OnPaint` 方法。If you are writing a new item and want to control all aspects of the painting, override the `OnPaint` method. 从 `OnPaint`中，你可以使用 中的方法。From within `OnPaint`, you can use methods from the . 默认情况下， 使用 设置进行双缓冲。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了如何实现一个自定义 类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a custom class. `GridStripRenderer` 类自定义 `GridStrip` 控件外观的三个方面： `GridStrip` 边框、 边框和 图像。The `GridStripRenderer` class customizes three aspects of the `GridStrip` control's appearance: `GridStrip` border, border, and image. 有关完整的代码清单，请参阅[如何：实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig void ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded() cil managed

summary.span: 如果需要基于计算机的 DPI 设置来进行缩放，则将 和 值应用于缩放箭头图标。

span.span: Applies the and values to scaling the arrow icon, if scaling is required based on the DPI settings of the computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig void ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded(int32 dpi) cil managed
Protected Shared Sub ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded (dpi As Integer)

param.name: dpi
param.span: 用于缩放的 DPI 值。

span.span: The DPI value to use for scaling.

summary.span: 基于指定的 DPI 值将 和 值应用于缩放箭头图标。

span.span: Applies the and values to scaling the arrow icon based on the specified DPI value.

remarks.format: 仅当应用程序在 .NET Framework 4.7.1 或更高[版本](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md#accessibility-switches)中使用，并且启用了 `EnableDpiChangedMessageHandling` 和 `EnableDpiChangedHighDpiImprovements` 配置开关时，才应在派生类中调用 `ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded` 方法的此重载。This overload of the `ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded` method should be called in a derived class only when an application opts into [per-monitor version 2](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md#accessibility-switches), targets .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later, and has the `EnableDpiChangedMessageHandling` and `EnableDpiChangedHighDpiImprovements` configuration switches turned on. 它通知 新的 DPI，并允许计算正确尺寸中的呈现箭头偏移量。It informs the about the new DPI and allows the offsets for rendering arrows in the right dimensions to be calculated.
